title: Ben Pointer
text:
Ben Pointer (born 25 May 1996) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a for the <a href="Midlands%20Hurricanes">Midlands Hurricanes</a> in <a href="RFL%20League%201">RFL League 1</a>.
Background.
Pointer was born in England on 25 May 1996.
Career.
London Broncos.
Pointer played for the <a href="London%20Broncos">London Broncos</a> in the <a href="Kingstone%20Press%20Championship">Kingstone Press Championship</a>.
Pointer has previously spent time on loan at the <a href="London%20Skolars">London Skolars</a>.
Newcastle Thunder.
Ahead of the <a href="2018%20RFL%20League%201">2018 season</a>, Pointer joined the <a href="Newcastle%20Thunder">Newcastle Thunder</a> after two loan spells with the London Skolars. He played 21 games that year, scoring 7 tries.
Sheffield Eagles.
Following his successful stint in <a href="Betfred%20League%201">Betfred League 1</a>, he joined <a href="Championship%20%28rugby%20league%29">Championship</a> side <a href="Sheffield%20Eagles">Sheffield Eagles</a> in October 2018. However, he left the club before the season began.
Coventry Bears.
On 4 Feb 2021 it was reported that he had signed for the <a href="Coventry%20Bears">Coventry Bears</a> in <a href="RFL%20League%201">RFL League 1</a>.
